Content.Text:
<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>. Hello. What can I do for you today?

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, you'd like to go on a date? Sure! That
sounds lovely. Let's go.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You look like you're having fun.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well, not that I'm NOT having fun.
<PAGE>
It's just that every once in a while, I wonder how
I could possibly be so entertaining to you.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
<WINDOW_DISCOURAGEMENT_R>Hmm, so you'd be happy with any girl, then?

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Oh, I'm not angry, but...the more you try to
backtrack and make excuses, the guiltier you
look. Please stop.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Well, that thoroughly spoiled the mood. No point
in going through the motions now.
<PAGE>
I'm sorry, but I think I'll be going home.
Goodbye, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
<WINDOW_PALPITATION_R>S-stop looking at me like that. I'm sure my face
is incredibly red right now...

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
You are always far too frank in what you say.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>If you don't start cushioning your words at least
a little, I don't know if my heart will be able to
take it.
<PAGE>
You know, it's been said that a person's heart
will only beat so many times in their life.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Are you trying to push me over the limit too
soon?

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Then please think a little more before you speak.
<PAGE>
Otherwise you'll end up breaking my heart.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Maybe that can be your homework for our next
date. Learning to be more careful with my heart.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Though it would hardly be fair for you to be the
only one with homework.
<PAGE>
I'll give myself the assignment of trying not to let
my heart race out of control at everything you
say.
<PAGE>
Both our assignments will be due on our next
date. Let's be sure to have them done on time,
all right, <MYNAME>?
